packages module

class packages.Packages(packages_file)[source]

Bases: object

Class representing all packages present in station network.

Attributes

packages_filestr

path to file with packages information each line being in following format: unique ID, ID of source station, ID of destination, time (HH:MM) of availability at source station

packagesdict

dictionary with keys being package IDs and values being instances of Package class

Methods

add_package(id, start, end, time_pack)[source]

Creates single instance of Package with given variables and puts it in packages attribute

Parameters

idstr

a unique package ID

start_stationstr

ID of source station

end_stationstr

ID of destination

timestr

time given in HH:MM format representing the time the package will be available at source station

create_packages()[source]

creates instances of Package from packages_file and puts them inpackages attribute using add_package method

get_package(pack_id)[source]

Returns instance of Package with given ID

Parameters

pack_idstr

unique ID of package

get_packages()[source]

Returns all instances of Package from packages attribute
